comments:
Created an attachment (id=75194)
Test case for reproducing the bug

Build ID:  I20070625-1500

I will attach a test case used for reproducing the bug.

The test loads, edits, save, loads again, edit and save the web.xml.
The error occurs on the second load. After the first save I have validated the web.xml file using the w3c xml validator and it seems to be valid.

Steps To Reproduce:

1. Start a new RuntimeWorkbench. Create a dynamic web 2.5 project named "org.test.dynweb". Close the RuntimeWorkbench
2. Download and start the test as a JUnit Plugin Test in the same workspace where the org.test.dynweb project was created.
3.The test tries to :
Create an IModelProvider for the project. 
Than to add a new jsp-config containing a taglib element. 
Save the provider using provider.modify().
Create a new model provider for the same project. 
Get the new model object from the provider.

While getting the new model object the following exception is thrown

org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl$1DiagnosticWrappedException: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.FeatureNotFoundException: Feature 'taglib' not found. (platform:/resource/org.test.dynweb/WebContent/WEB-INF/web.xml, 13, 13)

More information:

Created an attachment (id=75195)
Fixed project name

Then name of the project in the previous test case was not org.test.dynweb. I have fixed it.

Hi Kiril, 

The attached test cases passes OK on my installation - last 2.0.1 I-build on win32. 

I know you use a Linux installation. Can you check if the problem is specific to Linux only? 
What is the exact version of your target platform?

I think this was a versioning problem. 
I the moment I synced to JST 2.0.0.v200706182155 the problem did not appeared again.
I will do a double check on the versions and the behaviour of the test and eventually close the bug as INVALID
Again, it seems this was a problem with the versions

Strange... 

I am trying again the scenario with the M-2.0.1-200708161711 build (latest I-build) and it is now 100% reproducible. 

I am quite not sure what does this error means:

org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.FeatureNotFoundException: Feature 'taglib' not found.
(platform:/resource/org.test.dynweb/WebContent/WEB-INF/web.xml, 13, 13)

There is no javadoc for the FeatureNotFoundException. The {13, 13} position in the web.xml is right after the opening "<taglib>" tag. 

I reopen the bug.
